data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.5 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.3 PB 2
data.actual_result: Most of the time you don't see any suggestion. They only appear when typing something.
data.expected_result: Some suggestions although without any input should be shown.
data.short_description: Search parameters "from" and "mentions" don't show any user suggestions without input
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any server or DM - Open the search - Click on the search option `from:` or `mentions:` - Don't click enter, just observe the result, test if with different servers if you can't reproduce it the first time
